Key: Huh?
Yoshino?
Shido-san...?

What are you doing in a place like this?
You're not gonna go inside?
I was... looking at the sky...
The sky...?
Yes... it's... very pretty...

Oh, it's already evening. The sunset's peeking
through the clouds... It is pretty.
...Yes.

(Huh... For Yoshino to look pensively at the
sunset like this... She's quite the romantic.)

(I feel like it's been ages since I've looked
quietly at the sunset...)
Shin, can you hear me?

Reine-san?
Yes, I can hear you clearly.
Are you with Yoshino at the moment?
Yes, I am... What's wrong?
I apologize as it's the usual. I had lost track\nof Yoshino's position...
Her mental status appeared stable, so I thought\nshe must be near you.

Well, I am with her, but I just met up with her
a second ago.
Hmm... That's intriguing. Seeing such\nrelaxed numbers without anyone with her...\nWhat was Yoshino doing?
She was looking at the sunset, apparently...
The sunset?
Yeah. She was saying the sky was pretty...
I see. How interesting...
Shin, if you could, would you stay near Yoshino\nand observe her?

Huh? I didn't want it to get too late, so I was
planning on taking her back home...
I'm curious about something. I believe it would\nyield interesting results about the movement of\na Spirit's psychological state... Or so I feel.
Oh then, I guess I should...
Watch the sunset.
Take her home.

I understand. I'll treat the two of us to a sunset
date a little while longer.
I'm counting on you, Shin.
Is something... wrong...?
Oh, no... I thought I'd watch with you, too...
Really...?
Yeah... I'll try not to get in your way.

Y-You're not... in the way, at all...
I'd be... happy, if you could... watch with me...

I-I see... Then, since we're here...
Do you want to move to a place with a better view?
There's a place where you can see more of the sky.

(Getting on top of the roof makes me feel like I'm
a child again. It's so nostalgic...)
How pretty, Yoshino.
Hm?
Shido-kun, casual seduction is prohibited～!

Oh, I didn't mean it like that.
I was just saying the sunset is really pretty.
Ohh, you were talking about the sunset. Too bad,\nhuh, Yoshino～?

No... I'm glad that Shido-san and I...
feel the same way!

If you hadn't told me, Yoshino, I would have
missed out on such an amazing view.
Thanks, Yoshino.
...Yes!

Yoshino, we can't stay in a place like this
forever, we'd better head back home.
Huh...? U-Umm...

You can watch the sunset tomorrow, too.
You'll catch a cold if you stay out too late.
U-Um... a little... a little, longer, please...
D-Don't cry Yoshino! Just a little longer is fine.
Shin, that was a mistake. Yoshino's psychological\nstatus is about to become unstable.
Wha... That wasn't what I meant to...
Can I watch... a little bit, longer?

Y-Yeah... You can watch as long as you'd like.
But you have to come back home before it gets
dark, okay?
Yes...
Whew, I panicked a bit...
Shin, you have to be a more careful.\nThe accumulation of even small missteps\ncan lead to them losing control.
Yes... I'll be careful from now on...
